DOC.brief_summary: This randomize clinical trial evaluate blue light 5-aminolevulinic acid ( ALA ) photodynamic therapy different incubation time treatment actinic keratosis . Subjects interested participating , currently live Chicago metropolitan area , meet inclusion exclusion criterion enrol study . Subjects randomize either 1 ) zero time ALA incubation 2 ) 1 hour ALA incubation . Demographic health data collect prior treatment initiation . Three visit conduct : screening , treatment , follow visit 8 week . This study pilot study design determine feasibility procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Photodynamic Therapy Incubation Times Actinic Keratosis
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects diagnose actinic keratosis . 2 . Subjects investigator deem suitable photodynamic therapy face scalp . 3 . Males females â‰¥ 18 year old 4 . Fitzpatrick skin type IVI 5 . Subjects good health judge investigator . 6 . Subjects willing ability understand provide inform consent participation study able communicate investigator . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Subjects investigator suitable photodynamic therapy . 2 . Lesions suspicious proven skin cancer 3 . History 2 ALA PDT treatment within past 6 month . 4 . Use keratolytics within 2 day initiation treatment ( e.g. , > 5 % urea , glycolic acid , lactic acid , salicyclic acid ) 5 . Cryotherapy within past 2 week . 6 . Topical retinoids within past 4 week 7 . Procedures , microdermabrasion , ablative laser , ALAPDT , chemical peel , 5fluorouraci , diclofenac , imiquimod within past 8 week 8 . Systemic retinoids within past 6 month 9 . Pregnant breast feed 10 . Uncooperative subject subject neurological disorder incapable follow direction predictably unwilling return followup examination . 11 . Subjects unable understand protocol give inform consent . 12 . Subjects opinion investigator suitable study .
